name: FoodMe
description:
Hello, dear players, here is a full version of Tamagotchi, after two "test" version...
There are "some" of the economy, and besides the fact that you need to keep an eye on the pet,
you still need to monitor products and their money...
By the way, all the graphics, all the music, in short, everything in the game is made by one person... that's why it's so pathetic...

Updates:

- Full redraw of the game
- Pet replacement
- New actions for the pet (blow, closet)
- Map with shops, hospital and work
- The system of "Finance"and " trade"?
- New clothes
- Original music on the background and in the end
- Sounds when you press buttons
- Additional window for shops, wardrobe and work
- The ability to survive

P.S. sorry?
